@SkillersDream wrote:

for safezones find public boolean nonWild() { then go under and ur see stuff like this || (absX >= 2581 && absX <= 2589 && absY >= 4834 && absY <= 4842)
kk, the 2581 and 4834 is southwest cords. the 2589 and 4842 is the northeast cords. hope this helps out a lil

item.title: No-wildy
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

ok, we’ll take this in steps - first of all

  1. go into client.java and search “home” - it should look like this

     } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
     if (teleblock == true) {
         sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar
     } else {
         teleportToX = 2792;
         teleportToY = 3168;
         sendMessage("You teleport to Home.");

  2. Change the coords to your prefered location, this will be your home

2.you want to search for in client.java -
|| (absX >=
2. once you have found a whole heap of them eg;
|| (absX >= 2595 && absX <= 2611 && absY >= 4771 && absY <= 4778)
you will want to copy and paste one of them and then edit out the parts -

the first “absX >= 2595” is the first X coord of the corner of the safe zone
the “&& absY >= 4771” is the Y coord of the same corner eg you go into the corner of a box - type ::mypos and then go into the opposite corner but type the codes in the 2nd and 4th coord area.

sorry if this is slightly confusing but its the best i can do to help

Read full topic
